author: {'steamid': '76561198094226278', 'num_games_owned': 905, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1562441768}
review:
I wish this game had a more extensive single player mode.
It mainly focuses on the multiplayer modes which is a shame since the very small fan base has left by now so I can not find anyone to play with. This game seems like it would be a lot of fun to play with someone online and even more with a group of people online.
It seems though that it was never given the marketing and advertising it deserved causing it to go under. 
anyways:

[h1] Pros [/h1]

Good Music

Good Graphics

Fun Gameplay

Good Maps and characters


[h1] Cons [/h1]

Too online focused

No story mode

Fan base has faded

wacky AI in survival

no indication when you are being hit other then small health bar going down

author: {'steamid': '76561198141164919', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1504568099}
review:
I bought this game to try it out and I regret it. Its not fun at all and the controls are hard to work with. Also there are no options on the menu at all. You can't even do anything until you get into the game. Then once you do get in the game to fix the settings you die and have to start over again.. and again.. and again... You get the idea, its bad.

The gameplay is not very fun either for the price. Its not exactly the game you expect. Its just run around and shoot and things, mostly rats. Or whatever it is your fighting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053625520', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1505280717}
review:
vi el early acces de este juego y no me pude resistir... un shooter con conejitos y demas animales mutados todos musculosos con pistolas y escopetas dando balazos por ahi... que puede salir mal con eso?

su estado betha es muy evidente pero nadie lo esta ocultando.. por algo sera un early

la premisa de entrada es muy interesante y da para mucho jugo, espero que sepan aprovechar esto bien y que esto se convierta en una locura como su nombre lo reza con escenarios y personajes mas locos aun

hay mucho que mejorar pero el pincipal problema del juego es que no hay gente para jugar y bueno no es culpa del juego realmente asi que por ahora este juego va con un positivo porque me parece que es justo y necesario apoyar la propuesta xq se ve el cariño que la desarrolladora le tiene a este juego y mas teniendo en cuenta que lo desarrollan latinos, ya que salga la version final dare mi vedericto de forma mas critica y formal

author: {'steamid': '76561197990076503', 'num_games_owned': 1028, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1536415892}
review:
[b]This review is subject to change at different development stages of this game[/b]

For now, I'd say this game "just works", only a brief "framework".
Well it's Unreal 4 so graphics will be decent, I'm not worrying about that.
But at this time, without mouse sensitivity settings and damage indicator, I can barely enjoy this game.

So yes, I'm not recommending this game for my friends at this early development stage.
The concept is good though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198318811957', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1508408489}
review:
I bought this game on a whim mainly for the title name. However once I loaded up the game I started to really enjoy it. The game is early access so we must keep that in mind when writing a review. I would say that the game has alot of potential. The graphics look good, you can pick from a few different charecters that each have a specific weapon. Handguns, MiniGun, Sniper rifle are just to name a few. I would say the downfall is I havent really seen anyone hosting any matches so you should beware right now if you do not want to play single player or in co op mode with your friends then I would hold off. If you are fine with single player/co op then this is a game for you.

I do have one complaint and it rather small compared to issues I have seen with other games. When the crazy bunny demons come runing out it never fails that at least one gets just on a crate or on a wall. When this happens you generally just have to go hunt it down to finish....  Early Acess......

author: {'steamid': '76561197978490592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1499285425}
review: Alors plusieurs crashs du jeu  pendant le changement de touches Z Q D etc ....Jouer online ben il faut heberger ou rejoindre.... le probléme c'est que personne n'a le jeu donc il faut creer et attendre 1000 ans... j'ai plus la patience , le jeu a l'air TRES original surtout les personnages.. un petit air de bucky O hare pour les vieux qui se rappeleront du dessin animé,j'ai réussi à lancer le jeu mais que en co op Lan car oui il dispose quand meme d'un mode lan ça c'est un plus quand on veut organiser une Lan party  ,bref ne pas prendre le jeu maintenant attendre une hypothétique hype et encore .... je pense que c'est mal barré.Dommage mais j'ai plus la patience d'attendre des mois les joueurs donc REFUND.
